item.title: AI ‘prompt and pray’ hasn’t cut it in the enterprise, but we’ve found the missing puzzle piece. Mass deployment is next
item.description: Advanced AI systems are set to emerge as the solution companies have been waiting for.

item.title: Red Lobster’s millennial CEO practices emotional control so his team never sees him sweat
item.description: Red Lobster's millennial CEO Damola Adamolekun said practicing emotional control results in a more positive work environment for his team.

item.title: Moving slow? Starbucks will give you a free coffee today
item.description: Chain continues its push to lure back customers.

item.title: JD Vance says the main reason he’s attending the global AI summit is to have private conversations with world leaders ‘to help us diplomatically’ bring the Russia-Ukraine conflict to an end
item.description: Vance will have a working lunch with French President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday.

item.title: Nokia picks Intel exec as first U.S.-born CEO as group pivots to AI boom
item.description: Nokia has appointed Intel's AI exec Justin Hogard as it seeks to arrest stagnant revenues.
